thread.title: THAI Airways International Board of Directors Meeting Results

author: eTN Managing Editor
title: THAI Airways International Board of Directors Meeting Results
text:
THAI Airways International Board of Directors Meeting Results   
Aug 26, 2015 eTN   
Thai Airways International Public Company Limited (THAI) held its Board of Directors Meeting, chaired by Mr. Areepong Bhoocha-oom, Chairman of the Board of Directors, with the following results. 
Appointment of THAI Management 
The THAI Board of Directors approved the following management appointments in consideration of the continuity and success of the transformation plan, as well as transition period for newly appointed successors of those who are retiring end of September 2015. 
1. Flying Officer Suraphon Israngura na Ayuthya, Executive Vice President of Commercial has been appointed as Advisor to the President 2. Second Lieutenant Aussorn Naksrichum, Executive Vice President of Aviation Business Unit has been appointed as Advisor to the President 3. Mr. Teerapol Chotichanapibal, Advisor to the President has been appointed as Executive Vice President of Commercial 4. Mrs. Usanee Sangsingkeo, Managing Director of Ground Customer Services Department has been appointed as Executive Vice President of Aviation Business Unit
